mapper.select: SELECT Patient_Name as patient_name, Sex_ID as sex_id, Nationality_ID as nationality_id, HJ as hj, Date_of_Birth as date_of_birth, Occupation_ID as occupation_id, Address as address, ZD as xzd, SFGY as sfgy, SHBW as xshbw, FSDD as fsdd, YZCD as yzcd, FS_date as fs_date, Date_of_TB as date_of_tb, TBDW as tbdw, Person_of_TB as person_of_tb FROM FBK_BKBZ_Record WHERE 1=1 AND BKLX_ID = '01' order by Date_of_TB DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into MEDICAL_INFORMATION_ENREGISTER ( INF_ID, SICK_NAME, SICK_SEX, NATION, ZONE_TYPE, BIRTHDAY, OCCUPATION, ADDRESS, CREATE_TIME, WRITE_DOCTOR ) values ( #{ID}, #{SICK_NAME}, #{SICK_SEX}, #{NATION}, #{ZONE_TYPE}, #{BIRTHDAY}, #{OCCUPATION}, #{ADDRESS}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{WRITE_DOCTOR} )

insert into FIRST_DIAGNOSE_REPORT_HARM ( ID, HARM_REASON, DELIBERATELY, HARM_PART, PART_OTHER_TEXT, TAKE_PLACE, SEVERITY, OCCURRED_DATE ) values ( #{FID}, #{HARM_REASON}, #{DELIBERATELY}, #{HARM_PART}, #{PART_OTHER_TEXT}, #{TAKE_PLACE}, #{SEVERITY}, #{OCCURRED_DATE} )
